s: Vermont Maid syrup and hot, buttery pancakes are a perfect match! Families love pouring rich, golden brown Vermont Maid syrup over their waffles, breakfast sausages and even ice cream! The Vermont Maid brand has been in existence since 1919 and offers maple flavored syrups.

t: Vermont Maid
s: Vermont Maid® Syrup is a time-honored New England favorite. This rich, golden brown syrup has been bringing families to the table for more than 100 years. Crafted to the same high-quality standards since 1919, Vermont Maid Original Syrup is the perfect companion to pour over any meal.

t: Q: Please clarify, is Vermont Maid Syrup pure maple ...
s: Please clarify, is Vermont Maid Syrup pure maple syrup? What grade, A or B? The 3 bottles are plastic, each 24 ounces correct? Thanks ... Unfortunatley, there is no maple syrup in this brand at all. I buy it for my father who has used this same brand for 50 years.
